data.title: Population Growth and Decline in the Northern Part of Eretz-Israel during the Historical Period as Related to Climatic Changes
data.meta_description: Eretz-Israel (The Land of Israel) is located at the south-eastern corner of the Mediterranean Sea, between the Sea and the Syrian Desert. It is the transition zone between the Euroasian and African continents, and between the Mediterranean and the arid climatic zones...
